content:
TimeSeekOrigin Enum

Definition

Indicates the origin of a seek operation. The offset of the seek operation is relative to this origin.

In this Article

public enum TimeSeekOrigin
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
TimeSeekOrigin

Fields

BeginTime

The offset is relative to the beginning of the activation period of the Timeline.
Duration

The offset is relative to the stem.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration* of the Timeline, the length of a single iteration. This value has no meaning if the stem.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration* of the Timeline is not resolved.
